title: im pretty sure me and a few other people have been hacked
body:
<redacted>
 thats the link someone sent me and i trusted the link however its a scam and my accounts hacked  and it shows that i sent it to someone else while playing even tho i neaver did so  umm any ideas on fixes or how to stop it spreading?

replies.body: Don't click any roit point messages

Hey there,

If your account has been compromised and is unrecoverable (Email and password have been changed) then you'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for account recovery.

I would also recommend you have your friends do the same.

I've gone ahead and removed the link from your post. 
Please refrain from posting these sorts of links in the future as some users may click on them and fall for the same phishing attempt.
